00090             function                explode_into_words( $String , $MaxWordLength = 80 )
00091             {
00092                   try
00093                   {
00094                         $RawWords = strip_tags( $this->compile_phpbb_tags( $String ) );
00095                         $RawWords = str_replace( "\r" , ' ' , $RawWords );
00096                         $RawWords = str_replace( "\n" , ' ' , $RawWords );
00097                         $RawWords = explode( ' ' , $RawWords );
00098                         
00099                         foreach( $RawWords as $Key => $Value )
00100                         {
00101                               if( strlen( $Value ) > $MaxWordLength )
00102                               {
00103                                     $Parts = chunk_split( $Value , $MaxWordLength , '<br>' );
00104                                     $String = str_replace( $Value , $Parts , $String );
00105                               }
00106                         }
00107                         
00108                         return( $String );
00109                   }
00110                   catch( Exception $e )
00111                   {
00112                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00113                   }
00114             }

00138             function                get_as_http_cmd_line( $Params )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {     
00142                         $Counter = 0;
00143                         $RetCmdLine = '';
00144                         foreach( $Params as $Key => $Value )
00145                         {
00146                               $RetCmdLine .= "$Key=$Value";
00147                               $Counter++;
00148                               if( $Counter !== count( $Params ) )
00149                               {
00150                                     $RetCmdLine .= '&';
00151                               }
00152                         }
00153                         return( $RetCmdLine );
00154                   }
00155                   catch( Exception $e )
00156                   {
00157                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00158                   }
00159             }

00187             function                process_foreach( $Template , &$Record )
00188             {
00189                   try
00190                   {
00191                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->get_macro_parameters( $Template , 'foreach' ) ; )
00192                         {
00193                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00194                               $VariableName = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'var' );
00195                               $Data = get_field( $Record , $VariableName );
00196                               $SubTemplate = $this->get_block_data( $Template , "foreach:$MacroParameters" , '~foreach' );
00197                               
00198                               foreach( $Data as $k => $v )
00199                               {
00200                                     $Template = str_replace( 
00201                                           "{foreach:$MacroParameters}" , 
00202                                           $this->print_record( $SubTemplate , $v )."{foreach:$MacroParameters}" , 
00203                                           $Template
00204                                     );
00205                               }
00206                               
00207                               $Changed = false;
00208                               $Template = $this->hide_block( $Template , "foreach:$MacroParameters" , '~foreach' , $Changed );
00209                         }
00210                         
00211                         return( $Template );
00212                   }
00213                   catch( Exception $e )
00214                   {
00215                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00216                   }
00217             }

00245             function                print_record( $Template , &$Record )
00246             {
00247                   try
00248                   {
00249                         if( is_array( $Record ) === false && is_object( $Record ) === false )
00250                         {
00251                               throw( new Exception( 'Invalid record was passed' ) );
00252                         }
00253                         
00254                         $Template = $this->process_foreach( $Template , $Record );
00255                         
00256                         foreach( $Record as $Field => $Value )
00257                         {
00258                               if( is_array( $Value ) || is_object( $Value ) )
00259                               {
00260                                     $Template = $this->print_record( $Template , $Value );
00261                               }
00262                               else
00263                               {
00264                                     $Template = str_replace( '{'.$Field.'}' , $Value , $Template );
00265                               }
00266                         }
00267                         
00268                         return( $Template );
00269                   }
00270                   catch( Exception $e )
00271                   {
00272                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00273                   }
00274             }

00306             function                block_exists( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd = false )
00307             {
00308                   try
00309                   {
00310                         $StartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$BlockStart.'}' );
00311                         if( $StartPos == false )
00312                         {
00313                               return( false );
00314                         }
00315                         
00316                         if( $BlockEnd !== false )
00317                         {
00318                               $EndPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$BlockEnd.'}' );
00319                               if( $EndPos == false )
00320                               {
00321                                     return( false );
00322                               }
00323                         }
00324                         
00325                         return( true );
00326                   }
00327                   catch( Exception $e )
00328                   {
00329                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00330                   }
00331             }

00363             function                get_macro_parameters( &$StringData , $MacroName , $RegExValidators = array() )
00364             {
00365                   try
00366                   {                       
00367                         $StartPos = -1;
00368                         
00369                         for( ; ( $TmpStartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$MacroName.':' , $StartPos + 1 ) ) !== false ; )
00370                         {
00371                               $Counter = 1;
00372                               $StartPos = $TmpStartPos;
00373                               
00374                               $MacroStartPos = $StartPos;
00375                               $ParamStartPos = $MacroStartPos + strlen( '{'.$MacroName.':' );
00376                               
00377                               do
00378                               {
00379                                     $TmpStartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{' , $StartPos + 1 );
00380                                     $TmpEndPos = strpos( $StringData , '}' , $StartPos + 1 );
00381                                     
00382                                     if( $TmpStartPos !== false && $TmpEndPos !== false )
00383                                     {
00384                                           if( $TmpStartPos < $TmpEndPos )
00385                                           {
00386                                                 $StartPos = $TmpEndPos;
00387                                           }
00388                                           if( $TmpEndPos < $TmpStartPos )
00389                                           {
00390                                                 $Counter--;
00391                                                 if( $Counter )$Counter++;
00392                                                 $StartPos = $TmpStartPos;
00393                                           }
00394                                     }
00395                                     
00396                                     if( $TmpStartPos !== false && $TmpEndPos === false )
00397                                     {
00398                                           $Counter++;
00399                                           $StartPos = $TmpStartPos;
00400                                     }
00401                                     
00402                                     if( $TmpStartPos === false && $TmpEndPos !== false )
00403                                     {
00404                                           $Counter--;
00405                                           $StartPos = $TmpEndPos;
00406                                     }
00407                                     
00408                                     if( $TmpStartPos === false && $TmpEndPos === false )
00409                                     {
00410                                           /* ничего не найдено, поэтому внешний цикл закончен, да и внутренний тоже
00411                                              $StartPos = strlen( $StringData ); */
00412                                           $StartPos = $MacroStartPos;
00413                                     }
00414                                     
00415                                     if( $Counter == 0 )
00416                                     {
00417                                           /* нашли закрывающую скобку для макроса... */
00418                                           $Params = substr( $StringData , $ParamStartPos , $TmpEndPos - $ParamStartPos );
00419                                           
00420                                           $Valid = true;
00421                                           
00422                                           /* проверяем валидность параметров... */
00423                                           /* ... если надо */
00424                                           if( count( $RegExValidators ) )
00425                                           {
00426                                                 $ParamsList = explode( ';' , $Params );
00427                                                 
00428                                                 foreach( $ParamsList as $key1 => $p )
00429                                                 {
00430                                                       $p = explode( '=' , $p );
00431                                                       foreach( $RegExValidators as $key2 => $rev )
00432                                                       {
00433                                                             if( $key2 == $p[ 0 ] )
00434                                                             {
00435                                                                   $Matches = array();
00436                                                                   $Result = preg_match( $rev , $p[ 1 ] , $Matches );
00437                                                                   $Valid = count( $Matches ) == 0 ? false : $Valid;
00438                                                                   break;
00439                                                             }
00440                                                       }
00441                                                 }
00442                                           }
00443                                           
00444                                           if( $Valid )
00445                                           {
00446                                                 /* валидные параметры */
00447                                                 return( $Params );
00448                                           }
00449                                           
00450                                           /* поэтому вываливаемся из внутреннего цикла */
00451                                           $TmpStartPos = false;
00452                                           $StartPos = $MacroStartPos;
00453                                     }
00454                               }
00455                               while( $TmpStartPos );
00456                         }
00457                         
00458                         return( false );
00459                   }
00460                   catch( Exception $e )
00461                   {
00462                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00463                   }
00464             }

00496             function                get_block_data( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd )
00497             {
00498                   try
00499                   {
00500                         list( $StartPos , $EndPos ) = $this->get_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd );
00501                               
00502                         if( $StartPos !== false )
00503                         {
00504                               $BlockData = substr( 
00505                                     $StringData , 
00506                                     $StartPos + strlen( '{'.$BlockStart.'}' ) , 
00507                                     $EndPos - $StartPos - strlen( '{'.$BlockStart.'}' )
00508                               );
00509                               
00510                               return( $BlockData );
00511                         }
00512                         else
00513                         {
00514                               throw( new Exception( 'An error occured while getting block data' ) );
00515                         }
00516                   }
00517                   catch( Exception $e )
00518                   {
00519                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00520                   }
00521             }

00557             function                hide_anonimous_blocks( $StringData , $BlockType , &$Changed )
00558             {
00559                   try
00560                   {
00561                         $PlaceHolders = array();
00562                         do
00563                         {
00564                               $PlaceHolders = array();
00565                               
00566                               preg_match( "/\{$BlockType:([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/" , $StringData , $PlaceHolders );
00567                               
00568                               if( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 )
00569                               {
00570                                     $StringData = $this->hide_block( $StringData , "$BlockType:".$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , 
00571                                                                                      "$BlockType:~".$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , $Changed );
00572                               }
00573                         }
00574                         while( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 );
00575                         
00576                         return( $StringData );
00577                   }
00578                   catch( Exception $e )
00579                   {
00580                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00581                   }
00582             }

00614             function                get_all_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd )
00615             {
00616                   try
00617                   {
00618                         $Positions = array();
00619                               
00620                         $StartPos = -1;
00621                         $EndPos = -1;
00622                         
00623                         for( ; $StartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$BlockStart.'}' , $StartPos + 1 ) ; )
00624                         {
00625                               $Positions [ $StartPos ] = 's';
00626                         }
00627                         for( ; $EndPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$BlockEnd.'}' , $EndPos + 1 ) ; )
00628                         {
00629                               $Positions [ $EndPos ] = 'e';
00630                         }
00631                         ksort( $Positions );
00632                         
00633                         return( $Positions );
00634                   }
00635                   catch( Exception $e )
00636                   {
00637                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00638                   }
00639             }
00640       
00663             function                get_possible_block_positions( &$Positions )
00664             {
00665                   try
00666                   {
00667                         $StartPos = $EndPos = false;
00668                         $c = 0;
00669                         foreach( $Positions as $Key => $Value )
00670                         {
00671                               if( $StartPos === false && $Value === 's' )
00672                               {
00673                                     $c++;
00674                                     $StartPos = $Key;
00675                                     continue;
00676                               }
00677                               if( $EndPos === false && $Value === 'e' && $c === 1 )
00678                               {
00679                                     $EndPos = $Key;
00680                                     break;
00681                               }
00682                               if( $Value === 's' )
00683                               {
00684                                     $c++;
00685                                     continue;
00686                               }
00687                               if( $Value === 'e' && $c > 0 )
00688                               {
00689                                     $c--;
00690                                     continue;
00691                               }
00692                         }
00693                         
00694                         return( array( $StartPos , $EndPos ) );
00695                   }
00696                   catch( Exception $e )
00697                   {
00698                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00699                   }
00700             }
00701       
00732             function                get_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd )
00733             {
00734                   try
00735                   {
00736                         $Positions = $this->get_all_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd );
00737                         
00738                         list( $StartPos , $EndPos ) = $this->get_possible_block_positions( $Positions );
00739                         
00740                         if( $StartPos === false )
00741                         {
00742                               return( array( false , false ) );
00743                         }
00744                         if( $EndPos === false )
00745                         {
00746                               throw( new Exception( 'Block end was not found' ) );
00747                         }
00748                         
00749                         return( array( $StartPos , $EndPos ) );
00750                   }
00751                   catch( Exception $e )
00752                   {
00753                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00754                   }
00755             }

00795             function                hide_block( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd , &$Changed )
00796             {
00797                   try
00798                   {
00799                         do
00800                         {
00801                               list( $StartPos , $EndPos ) = $this->get_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd );
00802                               
00803                               if( $StartPos !== false )
00804                               {
00805                                     $StringData = substr_replace( $StringData , 
00806                                           '' , 
00807                                           $StartPos , 
00808                                           $EndPos - $StartPos + strlen( '{'.$BlockEnd.'}' ) 
00809                                     );
00810                                     
00811                                     $Changed = true;
00812                               }
00813                               else
00814                               {
00815                                     return( $StringData );
00816                               }
00817                         }
00818                         while( true );
00819                   }
00820                   catch( Exception $e )
00821                   {
00822                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00823                   }
00824             }

00860             function                show_block( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd , &$Changed )
00861             {
00862                   try
00863                   {
00864                         list( $StartPos , $EndPos ) = $this->get_block_positions( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd );
00865                         if( $StartPos !== false )
00866                         {
00867                               $BlockData = $this->get_block_data( $StringData , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd );
00868 
00869                               $StringData = substr_replace( $StringData , 
00870                                     $BlockData , 
00871                                     $StartPos , 
00872                                     $EndPos - $StartPos + strlen( '{'.$BlockEnd.'}' ) 
00873                               );
00874                               
00875                               $Changed = true;
00876                         }
00877 
00878                         return( $StringData );
00879                   }
00880                   catch( Exception $e )
00881                   {
00882                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00883                   }
00884             }

00920             function                iconv( $InCharset , $OutCharset , $Data )
00921             {
00922                   try
00923                   {
00924                         if( is_array( $Data ) || is_object( $Data ) )
00925                         {
00926                               foreach( $Data as $Key => $Value )
00927                               {
00928                                     set_field( $Data , $Key , $this->iconv( $InCharset , $OutCharset , $Value ) );
00929                               }                       
00930                               return( $Data );
00931                         }
00932                         else
00933                         {
00934                               return( iconv( $InCharset , $OutCharset , $Data ) );
00935                         }
00936                   }
00937                   catch( Exception $e )
00938                   {
00939                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00940                   }
00941             }

00965             function                compile_phpbb_tags( $Str )
00966             {
00967                   try
00968                   {
00969                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[b\](.*)\[\/b\]/U" , "<b>\\1</b>" , $Str );
00970                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[u\](.*)\[\/u\]/U" , "<u>\\1</u>" , $Str );
00971                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[i\](.*)\[\/i\]/U" , "<i>\\1</i>" , $Str );
00972                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[s\](.*)\[\/s\]/U" , "<s>\\1</s>" , $Str );
00973                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[img=(.*)\]/U" , "<img src=\"\\1\">" , $Str );
00974                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[code\](.*)\[\/code\]/U" , "<pre>\\1</pre>" , $Str );
00975                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[email\](\w*)\[\/email\]/U" , "<"."a href=\"mailto:\\1\">\\1</a>" , $Str );
00976                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[url=(.*)\](.*)\[\/url\]/U" , "<"."a href=\"\\1\">\\2</a>" , $Str );
00977                         $Str = preg_replace( 
00978                               "/\[size=(\d*)\](.*)\[\/size\]/U" , "<span style=\"font-size:\\1px;\">\\2</span>" , $Str
00979                         );
00980                         $Str = preg_replace( 
00981                               "/\[color=(\d*)\](.*)\[\/color\]/U" , "<span style=\"color:\\1px;\">\\2</span>" , $Str
00982                         );
00983                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[quote\](.*)\[\/qoute\]/U" , "<span class=\"quote\">\\1</span>" , $Str );
00984                         $Str = preg_replace( 
00985                               "/\[align=(\w*)\](.*)\[\/align\]/U" , "<span style=\"text-align:\\1px;\">\\2</span>" , $Str
00986                         );
00987                         $Str = preg_replace( 
00988                               "/\[spoiler\](.*)\[\/spoiler\]/U" , 
00989                               "<span id=\"spoiler\"><span id=\"spoiler_header\">{lang:hidden_text}</span>\\2</span>" , $Str
00990                         );
00991                         $Str = preg_replace( 
00992                               "/\[spoiler=(.*)\](.*)\[\/spoiler\]/U" , 
00993                               "<span id=\"spoiler\"><span id=\"spoiler_header\">\\1</span>\\2</span>" , $Str
00994                         );
00995                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[hr\]/U" , "<hr>" , $Str );
00996                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[hr=(\d+)\]/U" , "<hr width=\"\\1%\">" , $Str );
00997                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[name=(.+)\]/U" , "<"."a name=\"\\1\">" , $Str );
00998                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[list\](.*)\[\/list\]/U" , "<ul>\\1</ul>" , $Str );
00999                         $Str = preg_replace( 
01000                               "/\[list=1\](.*)\[\/list\]/U" , "<ol style=\"list-style-type: decimal;\">\\1</ol>" , $Str
01001                         );
01002                         $Str = preg_replace( 
01003                               "/\[list=a\](.*)\[\/list\]/U" , "<ol style=\"list-style-type: lower-alpha;\">\\1</ol>" , $Str
01004                         );
01005                         $Str = preg_replace( "/\[\*\]/U" , "<li>" , $Str );
01006                         
01007                         return( $Str );
01008                   }
01009                   catch( Exception $e )
01010                   {
01011                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01012                   }
01013             }

01111             function                compile_ultimix_tags( $Str )
01112             {
01113                   try
01114                   {
01115                         $Placeholders = array( '{lfb}' , '{rfb}' , '{eq}' , '[dot_comma]' , '[dot_dot]' , 
01116                                                          '[nbsp]' , '{sysdate}' , '{D}' , '{l}' , '{F}' , '{m}' , '{M}' , '{n}' , '{Y}' , 
01117                                                          '[eq]' , '{http_host}' , '{server_name}' , '{systime}' );
01118                         $Replacers = array( '{' , '}' , '=' , ';' , ':' , '&nbsp;' , date( 'Y-m-d' ) , 
01119                                                       date( 'D' ) , date( 'l' ) , date( 'F' ) , date( 'm' ) , date( 'M' ) , 
01120                                                       date( 'n' ) , date( 'Y' ) , '=' , @HTTP_HOST , $_SERVER[ 'SERVER_NAME' ] , 
01121                                                       date( 'H:i:s' ) );
01122                         
01123                         return( str_replace( $Placeholders , $Replacers , $Str ) );
01124                   }
01125                   catch( Exception $e )
01126                   {
01127                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01128                   }
01129             }

01171                         $Str = $this->hide_block( $Str , $BlockStart , $BlockEnd , $Changed );
01172                   
01173                         return( $Str );
01174                   }
01175                   catch( Exception $e )
01176                   {
01177                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01178                   }

01203             function                remove_bom( $Str )
01204             {
01205                   try
01206                   {
01207                         if( $Str !== false && strlen( $Str ) )
01208                         {
01209                               if( ord( @$Str[ 0 ] ) === 239 && ord( @$Str[ 1 ] ) === 187 && ord( @$Str[ 2 ] ) === 191 )
01210                               {
01211                                     $Str = substr( $Str , 3 );
01212                               }
01213                         }
01214                         
01215                         return( $Str );
01216                   }
01217                   catch( Exception $e )
01218                   {
01219                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01220                   }
01221             }
01222             
01245             function                common_prefix( &$Strings )
01246             {
01247                   try
01248                   {
01249                         if( isset( $Strings[ 0 ] ) === false )
01250                         {
01251                               return( '' );
01252                         }
01253                         
01254                         $CommonPrefix = '';
01255                         $MaxLength = strlen( $Strings[ 0 ] );
01256                         for( $i = 0 ; $i < $MaxLength ; $i++ )
01257                         {
01258                               foreach( $Strings as $j => $String )
01259                               {
01260                                     if( $Strings[ 0 ][ $i ] != $String[ $i ] )
01261                                     {
01262                                           return( $CommonPrefix );
01263                                     }
01264                               }
01265                               $CommonPrefix .= $Strings[ 0 ][ $i ];
01266                         }
01267                         
01268                         return( $CommonPrefix );
01269                   }
01270                   catch( Exception $e )
01271                   {
01272                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01273                   }
01274             }
01275 
01302             function                trim_common_prefix( &$Strings , $CommonPrefix = false )
01303             {
01304                   try
01305                   {
01306                         if( $CommonPrefix === false )
01307                         {
01308                               $CommonPrefix = $this->common_prefix( $Strings );
01309                         }
01310 
01311                         if( $CommonPrefix !== '' )
01312                         {
01313                               foreach( $Strings as $i => $String )
01314                               {
01315                                     $Strings[ $i ] = str_replace( $CommonPrefix , '' , $String );
01316                               }
01317                         }
01318                         
01319                         return( $Strings );
01320                   }
01321                   catch( Exception $e )
01322                   {
01323                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01324                   }
01325             }
01326       }
